paths.name: child_process
paths.message: Use SystemAdapter.exec/execSync/spawn instead of child_process directly. SystemAdapter handles cross-platform execution (WSL on Windows, native on Linux/Mac).

paths.name: path
paths.message: Use SystemAdapter.joinPath() instead of path.join(). SystemAdapter uses forward slashes and handles cross-platform paths correctly.

no-restricted-syntax.message: Use SystemAdapter.joinPath() instead of path.join(). SystemAdapter uses forward slashes and handles cross-platform paths correctly.
Use getHomeDir() from pathUtils instead of os.homedir(). getHomeDir() returns the correct home directory based on terminal type (WSL home for WSL terminals, Windows home otherwise).
Avoid checking process.platform directly. Use SystemAdapter to abstract platform differences. The adapter handles WSL-on-Windows vs native Linux/Mac transparently.
